ygData.subject: SPOILER - VIAL RECIPE
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, since people who announce they know something but are not telling annoy me, I will send out the formula for everyone.  I made multiple vials and will list
ygData.messageBody:
OK, since people who announce they know something but are not telling annoy
me, I will send out the formula for everyone. I made multiple vials and will
list
my skill levels below:

Vial

Small Block of Clay
Any non-ruined pelt - I have succeeded with Black Wolf Skin,
Puma Skin, Grizzley Skin, Low Qual Bear Pelt,
Med Qual Cat Pelt, High Qual Cat Pelt
Vial Sketch
High Quality Firing Sheet

Lined Vial

Small Block of Clay
Any non-ruined pelt
Lined Vial sketch
High Quality Firing Sheet (?)


With a skill of 120, I was successful on making 6 of 7 vial attempts.
My rate with lined vial attempts was 0 of 9, although I was received
the "Lack Skill" message and not the "Does not Combine" message.

Hope this helps.

Soren
Master Potter
New friend to
rogues...



"SGT James P. Hendrix" wrote:

> From: "SGT James P. Hendrix" <Hendrixj001@...>
>
> Well, boys and girls I have the Vial formula.... I will announce this to the
> board shortly however I would like to get the formula to a Small Diety
> sketch as a trade, so if anyone has it please e-mail me or reply to this
> group.
>
> The Poison Vial when completely made is::::
>
> Stackable
> costs 4g 5s to make
> sells for 5g 2s to NPC's
> needs a high pottery skill (mine was 129 and it went up when i was making
> the vials)
> the recipe uses 4 of the wheel slots.....Clay water sketch and the mystery
> component ;)
>
> As I said i'll give the whole thing prob on Sat or Sun but I wanted to give
> a heads up in advance to anyone who has the Small Diety Formula..
>
> Torii Druid 12th Season Povar
> Rolletta Shaman 16th Season Povar
>
> Wish i was smart enough to stock up on the sketches and sell em.... :(
>
> Hendrixj001@...
>
